jcr:content.jcr:title: List of people on stamps of the Cook Islands

contentheadline.headline: List of people on stamps of the Cook Islands

contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=November 2010}} This is a list of people on stamps issued by the '''[[Cook Islands]]''' and its constituent islands of [[Aitutaki]] and [[Penrhyn Island]]. ==Cook Islands== {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} == [[Aitutaki]] == *King [[Edward VII]] (1911) *King [[George V]] (1916) *[[James Cook]] (1920) *[[Te Po]] (1926) *[[Elizabeth II]] (1972) *[[Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh|The Duke of Edinburgh]] (1972) *[[Saint Veronica]] (1973) *[[Anne, Princess Royal|The Princess Anne]] (1973) *[[Mark Phillips]] (1973) *[[William Bligh]] (1974) *[[Winston Churchill|Sir Winston Churchill]] (1974) *[[Francis of Assisi]] (1975) *[[Onuphrius]] (1975) *[[John the Baptist]] (1975) *[[Alexander Graham Bell]] (1977) *King [[George III of the United Kingdom|George III]] (1977) *[[John Williams (missionary)]] (1977) *King [[George IV of the United Kingdom|George IV]] (1977) *[[Queen Victoria]] (1977) *[[Rowland Hill (postal reformer)|Rowland Hill]] (1979) *[[Albert Einstein]] (1980) *[[Charles, Prince of Wales|The Prince of Wales]] (1981) *[[Diana, Princess of Wales|The Princess of Wales]] (1981) *[[Prince William, Duke of Cambridge|Prince William (now Duke of Cambridge)]] (1984) *[[Prince Harry of Wales|Prince Harry]] (1984) *[[Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother]] (1985) *King [[George VI]] (1985) *[[Prince Andrew, Duke of York|The Duke of York]] (1986) *[[Sarah, Duchess of York|The Duchess of York]] (1986) *[[Mary (mother of Jesus)|Mary]] & baby [[Jesus]] (1986 & 1994) *[[Fletcher Christian]] (1989) *[[Michael Collins (astronaut)]] (1994) *[[Neil Armstrong]] (1994) *[[Buzz Aldrin]] (1994) *[[Pierre de Coubertin]] (1996) ==Penrhyn== The first [[Postage stamp|stamps]] issued by this tiny [[island]] in the Northern [[Cook Islands]] were stamps of [[New Zealand]] overprinted "[[Penrhyn Island]]" in 1902. It continued to use its own stamps until 1932. This first short list is from stamps in that early period. *[[James Cook]] (1920) *[[Edward VII]] (1914) *[[George V]] (1917) *[[Te Po]] (1927) Between 1932 and 1973 Penrhyn used the stamps of the Cook Islands. It resumed the use of its own stamps in 1973, and continues to do so. ==See also== *[[Postage stamps and postal history of Aitutaki]] {{DEFAULTSORT:List Of People On Stamps Of The Cook Islands}} [[Category:Lists of people on stamps|Cook Islands, List of people on stamps of]] [[Category:Communications in the Cook Islands]] [[Category:Cook Islands-related lists|Stamps]] {{CookIslands-stub}}
